verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> <S%H2791>secretly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> <S%H7200>view<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> even <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%> And they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and came <S%H935>into<s%> a <S%H802>harlot's<s%> <S%H2181><s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> and <S%H7901>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And it was <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H2008>hither<s%> <S%H3915>tonight<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to search <S%H2658>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> that are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H935>entered<s%> into thine <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they be <S%H935>come<s%> to search <S%H2658>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H6845>hid<s%> them, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3651>thus,<s%> There <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, but I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H370><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were:

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> about the time of <S%H5462>shutting<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> when it was <S%H2822>dark,<s%> that the <S%H376>men<s%> went <S%H3318>out:<s%> <S%H575>whither<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye shall <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them.

But <S%H1931>she<s%> had brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the house, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> them with the <S%H6086>stalks<s%> of <S%H6593>flax,<s%> which she had laid in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1406>roof.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H4569>fords:<s%> and as soon <S%H310>as<s%> <S%H834><s%> they which <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them were gone <S%H3318>out,<s%> they <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
And <S%H2962>before<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were laid <S%H7901>down,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1406>roof;<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>men,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> your <S%H367>terror<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us, and <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4127>faint<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>how<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, when ye came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt;<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> ye <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> ye utterly <S%H2763>destroyed.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

And as soon as we had <S%H8085>heard<s%> these things, our <S%H3824>hearts<s%> did <S%H4549>melt,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did there <S%H6965>remain<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7307>courage<s%> in any <S%H376>man<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>beneath.<s%> <S%H8478><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H7650>swear<s%> unto me by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> I have showed you <S%H6213>kindness,<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H2617><s%> that <S%H859>ye<s%> will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H571>true<s%> token: <S%H226><s%>

And that ye will save <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and my <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and my <S%H269>sisters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they have, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H5315>lives<s%> from <S%H4480>death.<s%> <S%H4194><s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> her, Our <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> yours, <S%H518>if<s%> ye <S%H5046>utter<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> our <S%H1697>business.<s%> And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> that we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

Then she let them <S%H3381>down<s%> by a <S%H2256>cord<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H2474>window:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%> was upon the <S%H2346>town<s%> <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H1980>Get<s%> you to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H6293>meet<s%> you; and hide <S%H2247>yourselves<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> be <S%H7725>returned:<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> may ye <S%H1980>go<s%> your <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H587>We<s%> will be <S%H5355>blameless<s%> of this thine <S%H4480>oath<s%> <S%H7621><s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast made us <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> when <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7194>bind<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8615>line<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou didst let us <S%H3381>down<s%> by: and thou shalt <S%H622>bring<s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother,<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household,<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>doors<s%> <S%H1817><s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%> into the <S%H2351>street,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H587>we<s%> will be <S%H5355>guiltless:<s%> and <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on our <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> any <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> upon him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> thou <S%H5046>utter<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> our <S%H1697>business,<s%> then we will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5355>quit<s%> of thine <S%H4480>oath<s%> <S%H7621><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast made us to <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> According unto your <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> be <S%H1931>it.<s%> And she sent them <S%H7971>away,<s%> and they <S%H1980>departed:<s%> and she <S%H7194>bound<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8615>line<s%> in the <S%H2474>window.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> were <S%H7725>returned:<s%> and the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> them throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> but <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

So the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3381>descended<s%> from the <S%H4480>mountain,<s%> <S%H2022><s%> and passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things that <S%H4672>befell<s%> them:

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3588>Truly<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> for <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> do <S%H4127>faint<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> us.
